results.name: Ternary Thue-Morse sequence: closed under a->abc, b->ac, c->b.
comment: 0 is a, 1 is b and 2 is c. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 30 2018
reference: M. Lothaire, Combinatorics on Words. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1983, p. 26.
link: Marko Milosevic and Narad Rampersad, Squarefree words with interior disposable factors, arXiv:2007.03557 [math.CO], 2020.

Michaël Rao, Michel Rigo, Pavel Salimov, Avoiding 2-binomial squares and cubes, Theoretical Computer Science, Volume 572, 23 March 2015, Pages 83-91.
